entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mention --roll-forward switch in error message when no matching frameworks are found #61019
  • Mono CI Utilization Improvements #61017
    7.0.0
  • Unable to remove windows audit permission using RemoveAuditRule c# #61015
  • .NET 6 RC2 websocket receive allocations #61011
  • WASM C APIs need a rooting audit #61008
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Threading.Tests.ThreadLocalTests.RunThreadLocalTest5_Dispose #60997

Closed

  • Unable to pass apple Notarization with .net 6.0 executable #61014
  • XDocument.LoadAsync #61013
  • Path of MyDocuments folder change in Windows11 #60924
    7.0.0
  • Creating ImmutableHashSet from an existing collection is very slow #29090
    Future
  • SortedSetEqualityComparer seems to ignore the comparer from CreateSetComparer #19994
    Future
  • Flaky test: Breadcrumb_thread_does_not_finish_when_app_has_unhandled_exception can fail due to output interleaving #60980
  • SortedDictionary.First performance #18668
    Future
  • API Proposal: StructuralComparer<T> #21123
    Future
  • Getting rid of ImmutableArray<T>.IsDefault ? #26829
    Future
  • Non-breaking space in Currency Formatting #61002
  • Hashset.IntersectWith should utilize O(1) ICollection.Contains methods. #1854
    Future
  • Implement generic version of System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary #29570
    Future
  • profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #57875
    7.0.0
  • In worst case, System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableQueue<T> takes O(n) #53902
    Future
  • Large Collections #46586
    Future
  • Please create a C# Interface 'IStack' for the .NET Framework Stack to implement #48285
    Future
  • Add parallel sorting implementation #51654
    Future
  • Dictionary, List and other Collection should have Empty concept #38340
    Future
  • Proposal: Add Range as List indexer Paramter #28562
    Future
  • Need a method similar to S.R.CS.RuntimeHelpers.InitializeArray, but for spans #24961
    7.0.0
  • LinkedList API Request #26502
    Future
  • Consider aligning `ToString` implementations for immutable collections to `ToString` for record types #47235
    Future
  • Deduplicate lots of AVL tree implementations in System.Collections.Immutable #19996
    Future
  • Add System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentHashSet<T> #39919
    Future
  • Add HashSet.AsReadOnly #29387
    Future
  • Linq ToDictionary() should presize for IReadOnlyCollection #26679
    Future
  • LINQ results implicit support for IReadOnlyCollection<T> #28651
    Future
  • Queue/Stack batch item Enqueue/Push #24988
    Future
  • Circular buffer data structure #15145
    Future
  • HashSet.GetOrAdd(T) #21603
    Future
  • GetConsumingEnumerable<T> #44323
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.* (breaking?) change in NET6.0 #60710
    Future
  • ConfigurationManager.ConfigurationSources disposes all config providers in .NET 6 #60975
    7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Invalid code may be generated when containing type has multiple declarations with unsafe modifier on some #60902
    7.0.0
  • What are the reasons behind limiting the number of requested sockets to `65535` for Socket.Select()? #60930

PullRequests

Created

  • Arm64: addressing modes #61026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Seed the unified System.Security.Cryptography.dll #61025
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Delete duplicate test projects #61024
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: limited version of forward substitution for some relops #61023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` #61022
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.x
  • support loading versioned libmsquic #61021
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` #61020
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [IGNORE] trying wasm pipelines #61018
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 2 #61010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Disable implicit tailcalls for throwhelpers #61006
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added */out/ paths that are created after the build to ignored ones. #61003
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix typo in profiler method #60999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Deduplicate class names in the type generator tests #60990
  • Log more info when perf counter category is missing #60955
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • [mono][s390x] Fix OP_MOVE_F_TO_I4 codegen bug #61009
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Alter amount of tests that run per PR for mono mobile configurations #60727
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Build mono by default #61016
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use Ubuntu 18.04 and dotnet-buildtools-prereq docker images for enterprise linux pipeline #61001
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [DllImportGenerator] Mark containing type for generated stub functions as unsafe #60979
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Disable DllImportGenerator tests on s390x #60833
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, arch-s390x
  • [wasm] preparation for module encapsulation #60928
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • JIT: "Scaled" addressing mode on ARM #60808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support AMR64/ARM environment variables for #53122. #60916
    community-contribution
  • JIT: Improve VN for (EQ/NE (RELOP ...), 0/1) #60943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][workload] Work around a msbuild bug in MatchOnMetadata #60989
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Add instructions for using Codespaces #60996
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix various dump generation issues for VS4Mac #60995
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #60988
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging blazor app after ts changes. #60873
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • lock protect nullability cache of symbolic regex node #60942
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • SortedList<TKey, TValue> added GetKeyAtIndex, GetValueAtIndex, and SetValueAtIndex #60520
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize SpanHelpers<T>.IndexOf #60974
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Make QCalls respect the EntryPoint property #60992
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Re-enable source generator tests failing due to OOM #60701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution
  • Fix for #60340 #60863
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • error C2665: 'CorSigUncompressData': none of the 3 overloads could convert all the argument types #60967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue #60966
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #60835
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • Skip eventpipe_readevents for arm32 #58545
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • throw exception when creating an entry name that already exists in ZipArchive #60973
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_USE_ICALL_NEWOBJ #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Setting nullable string properties from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Case sensitive filenames for nuget readme needs to be documented. #22397
  • BUG: FileVersion, ProductVerison is missing for Wrapper-Exe in .net 6 RC2 #22396
  • publish dll project will not copy dependent libraries automatically #22390
  • The CLI and VS do not play nicely #22388
  • Allow running `dotnet app.exe` instead of `dotnet app.dll` #22386
  • Allow running simple .exe files without .runtimeconfig.json #22384

Closed

  • win-arm64 SDK should default target win-arm64 for net5.0 and higher #21328
    6.0.2xx
  • dotnet new not working #22385

PullRequests

Updated

  • Switch the non-windows test builds to also run helix and non-helix in parallel. #22284
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve usability of Enable Nullable Reference Types refactoring #57476
  • Suggested change would break code #57472
  • Text for "Make Static" should read "Make Shared" in VB #57471
  • IDE0051 prompts for an error, and the extended GetEnumerator method is incorrectly considered not to be referenced #57470
  • Roslyn fails to detect nullability issues in tuple components' assignments through 'with' expressions #57469
  • Roslyn fails to warn about nullability issues with lambda expressions with natural types #57468
  • #if has same scope as other directive in C# scripting #57467
  • Formatter requires two passes in the presence of directives inside lambda block bodies, inside argument lists #57465
  • Remove the generated Razor document workaround in DiagnosticIncrementalAnalyzer #57459

Closed

  • API proposal: Introduce Minimum[CSharp|VisualBasic]LanguageVersion for refactorings and analyzers #56058
    Backlog
  • Opposite suggestion than obvious in VS 2022 #57439

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #57481
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run net6.0-windows unit tests in CI #57480
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reference VS Debugger.Contracts in DebuggerContractVersionCheck #57479
    Area-Interactive
  • Fix inline diagnostics location issue in VB #57473
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57462
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57461
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge `main` branch into `list-patterns` branch #57425
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix IDE remote analyzer loader on .Net Core #57407
    Area-Analyzers, Approved to merge
  • Update ServiceHub version #57443
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57460
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use VS2022 images when building Roslyn in CI #57396
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Interpolated string handler IOperation support #56276
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57464
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • List-patterns: Add declarations of public APIs #57434
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Refactor find refs to ensure there is always a gruoping for any symbol we're searching for. #57449
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57431
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57399
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57430
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • When we're loading dependencies in VS, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Classify method group assignments as methods #57410
    Area-IDE
  • Forbid interpolated string handler conversions that reference an instance as indexer arguments in nested member initializers #57456
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Benchmark for Inheritance Margin #57445
    Area-IDE
  • Remove legacy property from tagging #57454
    Area-IDE
  • Options refactoring #57139
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Slice value is always assumed to be not null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix param-nullchecking build/test failures #57375
    Area-Compilers
  • Update SymReader packages to the latest #57458
    Area-Infrastructure
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] Use cached delegate instances for method group conversions #6642
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Blocked, cla-already-signed, Community
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Move search under tabs #57188
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Report the RawConnectionId for HttpSys #37946
    6.0.x
  • HttpClientHttp2InteropTests.Echo test failure #37943
  • RunTime error: Could not load type 'Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.InplaceStringBuilder' from assembly 'Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives, Version 5.0.0.1...' #37941
  • Startup improvement: fortunes, multiple_queries, mvc #37938
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, connectionclosehttps #37937
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #37936
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #37935
  • Gets500_30_ErrorPage test failure #37932
  • Http2ConnectionTests.ResponseTrailers_MultipleStreams_Reset test failure #37930
  • Add E2EMigrationTests To `components-e2e` Pipeline #37929
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM - AD B2C - Unable to get access_token MSAL 2.0 #37928
  • Blazor Webassembly - Download files to application cache #37924
  • Single file build time improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #37923
  • System.NullReferenceException while HttpContextAccessor.HttpContext?.TraceIdentifier #37921

Closed

  • Flaky test - RouteTableFactoryTests.CanCacheRouteTable #36888
    6.0-docs-infra
  • IServerVariablesFeature not supported by Kestrel #37939
  • [Blazor] Disable running components E2E tests on Quarantined tests pipeline #37443
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Buffering needs to be configurable #3704
    Backlog
  • Refactor session to not require middleware #12060
    Backlog
  • Documentation for AspNetCore analyzers #29484
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Exponential RAM usage growth on startup with multiple [Route] attributes that specify templates with variable prefixes #36051
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Preview7 publish does not include compiled typescript output in static web assets #36334
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Publishing on GitHub breaks with .Net 6 preview7 sdk #35274
    6.0-docs-infra
  • .Net 6 Preview 7 SDK seems to replicate resources from NuGet packages #36335
    6.0-docs-infra
  • IJSInProcessRuntime and IJSUnmarshalledRuntime don't work in Blazor Server #37926
  • Overridden functions of an inherited component are not called #37925
  • Blazor Wasm authentication shared access token cache #32272
    Backlog
  • Startup regression: mapaction #37911
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #37912
  • Perf regression: https #37880
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #37838
  • Blazor Server: Provide the Option to Disable Multithreaded Rendering #37800

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine HttpClientHttp2InteropTests.Echo #37944
    area-runtime
  • Bump helix timeout for iis functionals #37942
    area-runtime
  • Create ReleasePlanning.md #37940
    Docs
  • Update StartupAnalyzers to use Analyzer.Testing library #37934
  • Fix groupIdentity in protobuf template #37919
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Add Server2022 to helix matrix & quarantine jobs #37918
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1

Merged

  • Report the RawConnectionId for HttpSys #37945
    7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine flaky tests #37933
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [Components] Unquarantine CanCacheRouteTable #37931
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Stop running Components E2E Tests in Quarantined Test Pipelines #37891
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Create AzDO PR templates for internal/* branches #37917
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Add Server2022 to helix matrix & quarantine jobs #37745
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • feat (Codespaces) - Added Commonly used tasks to `tasks.json` for VSCode users. #37873
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Many dotnet diagnostics tools fail to run on stuck container #2719
  • Document new Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client.DiagnosticsClient.WriteDump/WriteDumpAsync APIs #2717
    7.0.0

Merged

Updated

  • initial pull request for dotnet-trace report (topN feature) #2705

  • Add enable crash report flag to WriteDump client API #2715

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] SVG file with elements using "fill=rgb()" for the app icon will cause APT2259 error at build #3194
  • [Bug] WinUI fails to navigate to second page if the page is pushed onto the navigation stack before rendering #3193
  • [Bug] WinUI CollectionView is selecting the first item in the list on load #3192
  • [Bug] XAML Live preview don't work on Windows build #3190
  • [Bug] AppThemeBinding survives longer then it should if Binding type is OneTime #3188
  • [Bug] MAUI templates crashing on iOS #3186
  • [Bug] Crash setting Shadow in specific View on Android #3183
  • Customizable Content Dialog #3181
  • Unable to install and run mauiapp1 deterministically #3174

Closed

  • [Bug] Focus is lost when you press Ctrl+F + Esc #3182
  • [Bug] Nesting NavigationPages inside TabbedPages is currently broken on Android #2801
  • Could not find .NET MAUI (Preview) workload to installl on Visual Studio 2022 RC3 #3176

PullRequests

Created

  • BlazorWebView support for loading custom static assets #3191
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Test the signing #3189
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Use win10-* for the RIDs #3185
    area/templates 📄
  • Make Android the default in the templates #3187
  • Implement Invalidate method in GraphicsView #3142
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Update drawing dependencies #3175

Updated

  • Implement .NET 6 features for templates. #3018
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Clean up Shell Chrome Behaviors #3165
    area/shell 🐢
  • Set up for unpackaged app projects #3172
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls #3141
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄

entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests
